components.name: FIKWHB
components.content:
This is analysis which tests the ability of your project to deliver its objectives.

You should use your feasibility studies to:

  • test the context and resources within which the project is operating,    including market analysis and whether the financial, technical and
       management capabilities are strong enough to deliver the range of
       uses planned for the asset
  • test the viability and sustainability of the project in the long term
  • develop a strong business plan
components.title: Help with feasibility

components.name: ieRCkI
components.title: Tell us about the feasibility studies you have carried out for your project

components.name: aAeszH
components.title: Do you need to do any further feasibility work?

components.name: DojAvA
components.content:
In this section, we'll ask about:

  • feasibility studies carried out

name: Apply for funding to save a building in your community
